gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-041900rc3-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: 64bit works perfectly with good performance, 32-bit version will not launch. Xbox One controller works and multiplayer finds servers. Game crashed once the first time starting a race, never had it happen again (just a coincidence or a bug with proton or the game?).
title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.5-90.current, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Crashed once but couldn't get it to crash again. Performance was 90-110 FPS maxed out. Worked with keyboard and Logitech F310.
title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme

notes:
Some audio clipping, but otherwise plays smoothly.
NOTE: Although the game can be played in 32-bit, it won't remain stable (it eventually crashes during a race).  Doing so will also entirely prevent the game from being played in 64-bit.  To fix this problem, go to your steamapps folder, then compatdata, and then enter 243800.  Delete all of the contents within that folder.  Re-launch the game in 64-bit mode and it should be stable and playable.
title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme
